name: Interactive Multi-Game Demo Disc Version 24
overview: Interactive Multi Game Demo Disc v24 is a demo and video sampler disc, designed for retail store displays of the Nintendo GameCube. The sampler includes a simple menu and playable demos of Mario Power Tennis, Metroid Prime 2: Echoes, Star Fox: Assault, Resident Evil 4, and Virtua Quest. The disc also features trailers of the following: Geist, Donkey Kong Jungle Beat, Star Fox: Assault, Killer 7, Resident Evil 4, NBA Street V3, NFL Street 2, Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory, Mortal Kombat: Deception, Dragon Ball Z: Sagas, the Nintendo DS, and an ESRB ratings video.
